about.author: @Kaiconure
about.description: Provides a mechanism for scripted movement between points.

when: (result and not checkPosition(result)) or bounceNearest(result or vars.waypoints.routes[vars.waypoints.active])
commands: is_new_result and log('Bouncing to', vars.waypoints.active, 'location', result.x, result.y)

when: (result and not checkPosition(result)) or cycleNearest(result or vars.waypoints.routes[vars.waypoints.active])
commands: is_new_result and log('Cycling to', vars.waypoints.active, 'location', result.x, result.y)
